sentences.english: Tracy: It's said that a middle-school student got mercury poisoning after drinking a can of Sprite.

sentences.english: Jean Paul Gaultier Monsieur and Clinique Skin Supplies for Men remain key players.

sentences.english: A mountain temple. Clear water running under the verandah. Moss on the side.
